Gender Hack

Gender:

(mass noun) the state of being male or female (typically used with reference to social and cultural differences rather than biological ones) (Oxford Dictionaries)

Hack:

an inelegant but effective solution to a computing problem, heavy modification of the software or hardware of one’s own computer system, Hack)

Gender Hack:

A Hack that aims at opening up or modifying the gender dichotomy in an interesting way, and/or any use of IT to tackle gender issues.
